metadata.title: CVE-2021-46040 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Pointer Dereference Vulnerabilty exists in GPAC 1.0.1 via thefinplace_shift_moov_meta_offsets function, which causes a Denial of Servie(context-dependent).

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
